Title: Waisa Bhi Hota Hai Part II
Writer: Javed Ahmed (screenplay), Shashanka Ghosh (dialogue), Zunaid Memon (original script)
Actors: Arshad Warsi, Prashant Narayanan, Sandhya Mridul, Pratima Kazmi
Plot: After being asked to leave by his Policewoman fiancee, Agni Sinha (Sandhya Mridul), Punit Sanyal (Arshad Warsi) is lying drunk on a street bench in Bombay, when he comes across a wounded ...
